SmUtilities

Class PrismLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmUtilities.PrismLogger

  • public class PrismLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singleton instance of the prism logger. This logger is used to record the names of the output products, including their destination folders. Errors that occur during processing are also recorded here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PrismLogger INSTANCE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getLogFolder() 
      void initializeLogger(java.lang.String outfolder, java.lang.String time)
      This method initializes the logger and checks if the log folder exists, and if not it creates the log folder in the top level output folder
      void writeOutArray(double[] array, java.lang.String name)
      This method is used for debug, to write out data arrays as text files for debugging.
      void writeToLog(java.lang.String[] msg)
      Writes the array of text messages out to the log file, appending to the end of the current file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • INSTANCE

        public static final PrismLogger INSTANCE

    • Method Detail

      • initializeLogger

        public void initializeLogger(java.lang.String outfolder,
                             java.lang.String time)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method initializes the logger and checks if the log folder exists, and if not it creates the log folder in the top level output folder
        Parameters:
        outfolder - the top level output folder, where the log folder resides
        time - currently not used, but available if log files should be created new and not appended at the end of the existing file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write out a file

      • writeToLog

        public void writeToLog(java.lang.String[] msg)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the array of text messages out to the log file, appending to the end of the current file.
        Parameters:
        msg - the list of messages to be written out
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write to the file

      • writeOutArray

        public void writeOutArray(double[] array,
                          java.lang.String name)
        This method is used for debug, to write out data arrays as text files for debugging. The files are written into the topmost folder.
        Parameters:
        array - the data array to be written out
        name - file name to be used for the file

      • getLogFolder

        public java.io.File getLogFolder()
